title: Episode 212: Willie Pickton Part 3 AD FREE!!!
description:
The third and final part of this absolute nightmare has arrived. This episode covers the investigation on the farm TW: some serious animal cruelty is mentioned in the first half. Alaina will take us through some of the things found on the farm, what was done during the investigation to identify remains and what could potentially happen going forward!

Missing & Murdered Indigenous Women & Girls
https://www.mmiwg-ffada.ca/

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
